tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_variation (
  individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  population_id INT,
  allele_1 VARCHAR(10),
  allele_2 VARCHAR(10),
  variant_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE variants ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	chromosome INT,
	position INT,
	allele1 TEXT,
	allele2 TEXT )

CREATE TABLE populations ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	population_name TEXT,
	region TEXT,
	sample_size INT )

CREATE TABLE individuals (
  individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT REFERENCES species(species_id),
  individual_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  sex CHAR(1),
  age INT
);

CREATE TABLE Population (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    population_name VARCHAR,
    region VARCHAR,
    average_genetic_variation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Sample (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    population_id INT,
    ethnicity VARCHAR,
    sample_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE Variation (variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    chromosome VARCHAR,
    position INT,
    genotype VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Migration (migration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_population_id INT,
    destination_population_id INT,
    migration_rate FLOAT
)
